sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">
v-app(:style="{backgroundColor: '#333333'}")
    transition(name="page" mode="out-in")
        router-view(:key='$route.path')
    #myMenu(@click.stop='drawer = !drawer')
        .menuBack(:style="{'background-color':color.but}")
            .menuBox
                .menuBar1
                .menuBar2
                .menuBar3
    v-navigation-drawer(v-model='drawer' absolute='' bottom='' temporary='' :style='{backgroundColor: color.but}')
        v-list(nav='' dense='')
            v-list-item-group(v-model='group' active-class='white--text text--accent-4')
                v-list-item(v-for='item in menuItems' :key='item.title')
                    v-list-item-title(@click="dakaPage=false")
                        router-link(:to='item.link' :style="{color: '#FFF'}" ) {{item.title}}
    .home
        router-link(to='/' :style="{color: '#FFF'}") HOME

</template>


<script>
import daka from './components/daka';

export default {
    components: {
        daka
    },
    data() {
        return {
            drawer: false,
            group: null,
            dakaPage: true,
            menuItems: [
                {title: "加班申請",link: '/OTsubmmit'},
                {title: "休假申請",link: '/leave/Picker'},
                {title: "打卡紀錄",link: '/recording'},
                {title: "補休累計時數",link: '/compensatoryTime'},
                {title: "職務代理人設定",link: '/agent'}
                ],
            color: {
                bgc: "#333333",
                but: "#A78E70"
            }
        }        
    },
    watch: {
        group () {
            this.drawer = false
        }
    },

    
    methods: {
        updateCurrentTime() {
            var moment = require('moment'); 
            moment().format();
            this.currentTime = moment().format('HH:mm:ss');
            this.date = moment().format("YYYY-MM-DD ddd")
        },
        buttontr () {


        }

    },

    created() {
        setInterval(() => this.updateCurrentTime(), 1 * 1000);
    }
}       
</script>

<style lang="sass">
#app
    font-family: 'Microsoft JhengHei', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif

html
    text-align: center
    color: #eee
h1, p
    color: #FFF
h1
    padding-top: 100px

.router-link-active, .router-link
    text-decoration: none

.timeDaka
    position: absolute
    width: 300px
    display: inline-block
    font-size: 60px
    text-align: center
    line-height: 180px
    color: #ffffff
    float: left
    left: 50%
    top: 25%
    margin-left: -150px 
    font-weight: bold
    
.dateDaka
    width: 500px
    font-size: 20px
    display: inline-block
    float: left
    position: absolute
    color: #333
    text-align: center
    left: 50%
    margin-left: -250px
    font-family: Teko
    -webkit-text-stroke: 1px #fff
    font-weight: bold
    top:  28%

.buttonDaka
    position: absolute
    font-weight: bold
    width: 100px
    height: 100px
    border-radius: 100%
    // display: inline-block
    // justify-content: center
    // vertical-align: middle
    left: 50% 
    // margin: auto
    margin-left: -50px 
    margin-top: -50px
    line-height: 100px
    text-align: center
    color: #FFF
    background-color: #A78E70
    // float: left
    top: 50%
    // margin-top: 170px
    cursor: pointer
    transition: 1s



.buttona
    background-color: #A78E70
    position: absolute
    width: 100px
    height: 100px
    border-radius: 100%
    left: 50% 
    top: 50%
    margin-left: -50px 
    margin-top: -50px
    animation-name: big
    animation-duration: 0.6s
    -webkit-animation-fill-mode: forwards
    transform-origin: 0 50

@keyframes big
    0%
        // position: absolute
        // left: 50% 
        // top: 50%
        // margin-left: -50px 
        // margin-top: -50px
        // width: 100px
        // height: 100px
    100%
        position: absolute
        left: 20% 
        top: 50%
        margin-left: -50px 
        margin-top: -50px
        transform: scale(100,100)




.noteDaka
    position: absolute
    text-align: center
    display: inline
    top: 50%
    left: 50%
    color: #ffffff
    float: left
    width: 300px
    height: 100px
    margin-top: 85px
    margin-left: -150px
.button-enter-active, .button-leave-active
    transition: 0.6s
.button-enter, .button-leave-to
    opacity: 0

#myMenu
    position: absolute
    left: 5%
    top: 5%
    width: 50px
    height: 50px
    margin: 0

.menuBar1, .menuBar2, .menuBar3
    width: 35px
    height: 3px
    background-color: white
    transition: 0.3s
    margin: 6px 0
    position: relative
    left: 3%
    border-radius: 15%

.menuBack
    width: 50px

    position: relative
    
    transition: 0.3s

.menuBox
    width: 50px
    padding: 8px
    transition: 0.6s
    cursor: pointer
    &:hover
        box-shadow: 2px 2px 2px rgba(51, 51, 102, 0.6), 4px 4px 6px rgba(51, 51, 102, 0.4), 6px 6px 12px rgba(51, 51, 102, 0.4)



.menuList
    margin-top: 60px

.home
    height: 40px
    width: 100px
    line-height: 30px
    text-align: center
    padding: 5px
    border: 1px solid white
    position: absolute
    right: 10%
    bottom: 10%
    transition: 0.6s
    cursor: pointer
    &:hover
        background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3)
.page-enter-active, .page-leave-active
    transition: 0.6s

.page-enter, .page-leave-to
    opacity: 0


// a
//     display: block
//     text-decoration: none
//     font-size: 120%
//     color: #FFF

</style>
